channel.title: Client wont work?
channel.description: me and mymate have dled a client, i am the hoster so i dl the source. we both go in to client and i have it set on localhost. and supposably he has to put his on our ip.. he has done that. file saved and compiled and has come up with 6 errors. i really dont get it. can some1 help me!! plus my mate!
